events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back for the incorrect item.
An available customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and communicate further with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so that we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 458392 and attached is the photo showing the product I received, which is clearly different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will immediately process your refund and send you a prepaid return label so the wrong item can be shipped back at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the solution and I look forward to receiving the return label soon.
Your refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know once you have shipped the incorrect product back.
Just following up to check if you were able to return the item and if your refund has been received to your satisfaction.
Thank you for confirming the return and refund. We are closing your case now, but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
